infos.value: Though each individual request may be something small, I believe that they all form a cobble on the pathway to peace.
I am looking forward to the day that you become the ruler of this country—and eventually this continent, Lord Mont.

• Subquests •
Here, you can acquire rewards by completing requests from clients.
Unlike missions, you must <color=#00ffff>manually accept requests</color> and carry out what they ask you to do, so be sure to check for Subquests and accept them frequently.
